# Thank you for your contribution!

### Please fill this template

---

### Type of change:

_**REQUIRED** - Select the type of change_

- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] New Implementation
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Performance
- [ ] Tests
- [ ] Configuration
- [ ] Other

##### If 'Other' was selected, please write here which type it was:

```text
Example: CI/CD
```

---

### Related issue

_Paste the issue identification_

```text
Example: #34
```

---

### Description

_**REQUIRED** - Please describe the changes made_

```text
Example: Created database table in flyway
```

--- 

### What was changed?

_Add topics of what was the changes you made_

- Change 1
- Change 2
- Change 3

---

### Why was this change needed?

_Describe what was the motive to do this change_

```text
Example: Saving everything in one table was using too much memory
```

---

### Test files

_**REQUIRED** - Add the filename of the tests created / modified_

- TestClassOne.java
- TestClassTwo.java

---

### Checklist

_**REQUIRED** - Check the items below_

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I executed the tests locally
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix / functionality
- [ ] I updated the documentation (if necessary)
- [ ] Commits follow the [conventional pattern](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/en/v1.0.0/)

---

### Additional observations

_Links, comments or any additional information_

```text
Example: Do not modify already created flyway migrations
```
